description.en: Start with 2 int arrays, a and b, return how many of them start with 1.
description.ru: Даны 2 массива. Верните, сколько из них начинаются с 1.
description.uz: 2 butun sonli massiv berilgan. Ulardan nechtasi 1 bilan boshlanadi, shuni qaytaring.

solution: function start1(a,b) { let count=0; if(a[0]===1) count++; if(b[0]===1) count++; return count; }
